it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.nat

Class DNAT

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.Node
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip4.Ip4Node
        • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.nat.DNAT

  • public class DNAT
extends Ip4Node
    Bidirectional D-NAT node. It is a special D-NAT (destination NAT) that modifies also the source address.

    As D-NAT, destination address of new incoming packets is uses as key of a lookup table (the NAT table) for obtaining the pair of new source and destination addresses.

    Since it performs D-NATting, it works only with static NAT table entries (address mappings), that have to be explicitly set through the add(Address, Address, Address) method.

    Note: As simple NAT, it modifies only IP addresses, while port numbers remain unchanged.
